doc.name: dragDelta
doc.summary: Specifies the distance the pointer must be moved to initialise drag behaviour.

description.p: Use the dragDelta property to fine-tune drag behaviour.
The dragDelta is an integer greater than 0. The default value is the system default.
This specifies the number of pixels the mouse pointer must be moved after a mouse button has been pressed for a dragStart message to be sent to the current control.
